>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/books/{id}/notes"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Add note to book

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"ID of book (NOT ISBN)","in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"content":{"description":"Content of the note","type":"string"},"created_on":{"description":"Date of note creation (optional)","format":"date-time","type":"string"},"visibility":{"description":"Visibility of the note (hidden or public)","type":"string"}},"required":["content"],"type":"object"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Note created."}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
